page.title: 01BISHOPS FROME AND ENVIRONS
page.content: The block is a rural area encompassing all the village of Bishops Frome - with its church, general stores and post office, hairdresser, two pubs, garage and small industrial estate - and also the outskirts of a smaller community of Fromes Hill. Both communities are in general active, contented and caring people. The mainly agricultural landscape has two hilly areas - at the north Munderfield Bank and at the east the ridge from Fromes Hill to Ward Hill. The rest of the area forms a plain through which flows the River Frome. For most of the year the river is no more than a stream, but prolonged heavy rain or melting snow in winter can cause extensive flooding.
